metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20856 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.18.7. Inblock/blk-core.c, there is an __blk_drain_queue() use-after-free because acertain error case is mishandled.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
